Portal and Portal 2 are fun games with amazing gameplay and lore. I question why it had to stop there,same with Half Life. Portal 2 has lived up to its potential i believe and that the ending left me some hope that there will be Portal 3. The amazing part is that the conflict between Glados and Chell turned into friendship. Hopefully the creators can make and ending of Portal if they come back with passion that i have for the series.

Игра достойна своих денег, здесь нужно думать как пройти уровень, а не просто так прыгать по порталам, нужна хорошая реакция в некоторых локациях. Вобщем игра класс, есть co-op, свои тесты создавать можно, советую поиграть, тем более, что по скидкам, игра стоит копейки, а развеселить и порадовать она сможет вас на раз-два

One of the best puzzle games!
真正的神作，不需要很多复杂的内容，简单的几种道具组成了无穷多的玩法，剧情本身也十分精彩，除了对一些3D眩晕症玩家不友好之外几乎找不到缺点。打折才几块钱，就算原价买也完全值回票价，如果可以的话我愿意给一万颗星，强烈推荐！

((((SPOILER ALERT))))

verdaderamente antes de comprarlo y jugarlo, mis expectativas eran de que este juego se iva a tratar siempre en aperture science, pero al darme cuenta de lo contrario mientras lo jugaba, al sentirme familiarizado con este juego, al ver dichas expreciones en los personajes y al vivir esta gran historia... solo quisiera decir gracias a los desarrolladores, a los guionistas de esta gran historia, a los modeladores que hicieron de lo visual posible, a los que ambientaron este gran ambiente y... a Gabe Newell.

Portal 2 (2011)

Great puzzles to solve with your two way portal gun, blue portal and orange portal, where you bend space to make portals to go through. Really had to sit and think a bit about how to solve certain puzzles. Also great humour throughout the entire game from start to finish. For extra chaos, try co-op with a friend and see how many times you can backstab each other!

хорошо

Acclamato seguito di Portal, questo capitolo riesce a rinnovarsi su tutti gli aspetti. Graficamente e con gli effetti di luce è veramente spettacolare e molto godibile da vedere anche adesso, di gameplay ci sono state notevoli e piacevoli aggiunte oltre che ad un miglioramento generale e ad un ampiamento dei sistemi di superamento dei test, grazie proprio a delle nuove funzioni. La trama in Portal era bellissima già nel 1, ma qui è veramente spettacolare, molto più fuori dagli schemi, ben costruita e meglio articolata in tutto e per tutto, comprese le pochissime cutscene che si possono trovare. La co-op è fantastica, giocare con un amico e risolvere insieme le camere dei test è un'esperienza assai diversa dagli altri titoli giocabili in co-op, ha una trama anche qui, è particolare, divertente e relativamente duratura, anche se la difficoltà non è troppo esagerata secondo me. Con la funzione della comunità è possibile creare e condividere le proprie mappe con l'utenza, il che lo rende rigiocabile al massimo. Questo gioiello di gioco è un must have.

Fantastic, fun puzzle game.  Some of the puzzles are quite devious but I can honestly say I solved the entire game without any hints (and I never played the original Portal).  The story has humor and is clever.  The graphics and controls are great.  Even though I liked the story, I would love to see a version which just takes all the game mechanics and has tons of puzzles.  Anyway it's a wonderful game and cracking some parts of it was quite satisifying.  I recommend it to anyone who wants a challenge along with an engaging (if not very deep) story.

amo este juego

"I’ve been thinking. When life gives you lemons? Don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons! What am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life’s manager! Make life rue the day it thought is could give me lemons! Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s going to burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m going to get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!"
A really nice extension of the first game, with added mechanics and a great little story.

The start of the game is amazing! I couldn't ask for a better start. Once I got into the game I was thinking "Please don't let it be the same theme of endless puzzles" I expected it to be, but I was highly mistaking. This game has an amazing story line and character development. The ending is such a twist, but the good kind. By far the best game I have played on steam. For only $9.99 BUY THIS. In my opinion it's under priced. I would easily pay $25 for it.

One of the things that I looked forward to when walking into this game was something that was the usual formula of taking puzzle chambers and then kicking you into a heated but nonetheless subtle (so to speak) story that made the original Portal an instant memorable piece to me. And in a way it succeeded, but to a lesser degree. It does follow the same relative direction I just told you about, but it seems to to switch on and off at times. It becomes tiring (to an extent) when you re-meet  (INSERT SPOILER HERE), who would be your friend turned enemy in this game, and have go through a lot of chambers for a THIRD time just so you could get a stab at the boss. Luckily, this game saves frequently, so redoing large sections of the game is not a problem for most of the time. 
         One thing to compliment this game on? The story, the story, and the story. By god, if they didn't already formulate a complex and interesting yet somehow simple to comprehend story in Portal 1, then they expanded upon it greatly and hardly complicated it further in the process. I won't spoil it, because it has to experienced to be appreciated. 
         That's how I feel at the moment. I haven't downloaded any DLC yet, but I'm just talking about the game at hand, so that's fine and dandy. So this is where I stand: If you want an all round memorable game that is fun yet offers little storywise, Portal 1 is the right place to play. A more story inclined person with a longer attention span should get Portal 2, on the other hand. But both these games combined create the most fun and challengingly great games on Steam as a whole. I'm serious. This'll be the greatest twenty dollars (at most) you will ever spend. 

Also, GLaDOS is like, the greatest character in a game, like ever, so yea.
